title: Game keeps freezing my computer.
body:
For the past week , my game has been randomly freezing ONLY in League of Legends. I've been reported multiple times and my friends don't wanna play league with me anymore since they think I disconnect on purpose. My game simply freezes and I have to reboot via a button on my PC case ( the whole pc freezes and I don't have access to the restart button). Sometimes , the game does unfreeze after around 20 seconds but that has only happened a few times.

My graphics driver is fully up to date.

PC Specs : 
Intel Core i7-3930k @ 3.20GTHz
64 GB of RAM ( A lil' overkill)
Windows 10 pro.

replies.body:
Yea I really don't think your pc specs are to blame here, that's a heckin' lot of RAM O_O, pretty jealous myself xD!

I want you to double check your drivers first (only due to how often people can miss this little step) but also check to see if any background programs might be causing your pc to lock up like that. Trying running a clean boot and see if League crashes when it's the only program running.
